‚îÇ   ‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Sync.bru                 ‚Üê POST /api/transcribe/stt-v1/sync
‚îÇ   ‚îÇ   ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Batch.bru                ‚Üê POST /api/transcribe/stt-v1/batch
‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ STT V2/
‚îÇ   ‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Sync.bru                 ‚Üê POST /api/transcribe/stt-v2/sync
‚îÇ   ‚îÇ   ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Batch.bru                ‚Üê POST /api/transcribe/stt-v2/batch
‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Chirp/
‚îÇ   ‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Sync.bru                 ‚Üê POST /api/transcribe/chirp/sync
‚îÇ   ‚îÇ   ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Batch.bru                ‚Üê POST /api/transcribe/chirp/batch
‚îÇ   ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Gemini/

‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Compare/

‚îÇ   ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Compare Batch.bru            ‚Üê POST /api/transcribe/compare/batch
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Streaming/
    ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Streaming STT V1.bru         ‚Üê WS /ws/transcribe/stt-v1
    ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Streaming STT V2.bru         ‚Üê WS /ws/transcribe/stt-v2

```

**Detalhes:**
- **Environment "Local"** com `baseUrl` e `wsUrl` configurados para `localhost:5145`
- Todos os endpoints de transcri√ß√£o usam `multipartForm` com campo `audio` (file upload)
- Os endpoints de streaming incluem `docs` explicando que s√£o WebSocket e sugerindo `wscat` para teste (Bruno n√£o suporta WS nativamente)
- Para usar: abra a collection no Bruno, selecione o environment **Local** e escolha o arquivo de √°udio no campo `audio`

children.text: public static IEndpointRouteBuilder MapHealthEndpoints(this IEndpointRouteBuilder app)
public static IEndpointRouteBuilder MapTranscribeEndpoints(this IEndpointRouteBuilder app)
.WithSummary("Batch transcription via Speech-to-Text V1 LongRunningRecognize (up to 480 min)")
.WithSummary("Batch transcription via Speech-to-Text V2 BatchRecognize (up to 480 min)")
.WithSummary("Batch transcription via Chirp model BatchRecognize (up to 480 min)")
.WithSummary("Synchronous transcription via Gemini (Vertex AI) ‚Äî ‚â§ 20 MB audio")
var result = await service.TranscribeSyncAsync(stream, audio.ContentType, ct);
var gcsUri = await storageService.UploadAsync(stream, audio.FileName, audio.ContentType, ct);
var result = await service.TranscribeBatchAsync(gcsUri, audio.ContentType, ct);
var result = await service.TranscribeSyncAsync(stream, audio.ContentType, ct);
var gcsUri = await storageService.UploadAsync(stream, audio.FileName, audio.ContentType, ct);
var result = await service.TranscribeBatchAsync(gcsUri, audio.ContentType, ct);
var result = await service.TranscribeSyncAsync(stream, audio.ContentType, ct);
var gcsUri = await storageService.UploadAsync(stream, audio.FileName, audio.ContentType, ct);
var result = await service.TranscribeBatchAsync(gcsUri, audio.ContentType, ct);
public static IEndpointRouteBuilder MapCompareEndpoints(this IEndpointRouteBuilder app)
.WithSummary("Transcribe audio with all enabled providers in parallel and compare results")
.WithSummary("Batch transcription with all enabled providers (uploads to GCS first)")
// Read audio into memory so we can send to multiple providers
var services = new[] { sttV1, sttV2, chirp, gemini };
DurationSeconds: 0, // cannot determine without parsing audio headers
// Upload once, use GCS URI for all batch-capable providers
var gcsUri = await storageService.UploadAsync(uploadStream, audio.FileName, audio.ContentType, ct);
var services = new[] { sttV1, sttV2, chirp }.Where(s => s.SupportsBatch);
var tasks = services.Select(svc => svc.TranscribeBatchAsync(gcsUri, audio.ContentType, ct));
private static ComparisonResult BuildComparison(AudioInfo audioInfo, List<TranscribeResponse> results)
public static IEndpointRouteBuilder MapStreamingEndpoints(this IEndpointRouteBuilder app)

    ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Streaming STT V1.bru         ‚Üê WS /ws/transcribe/stt-v1
    ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Streaming STT V2.bru         ‚Üê WS /ws/transcribe/stt-v2
    ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Streaming Chirp.bru          ‚Üê WS /ws/transcribe/chirp
```

**Detalhes:**
- **Environment "Local"** com `baseUrl` e `wsUrl` configurados para `localhost:5145`
- Todos os endpoints de transcri√ß√£o usam `multipartForm` com campo

(file upload)
- Os endpoints de streaming incluem `docs` explicando que s√£o WebSocket e sugerindo `wscat` para teste (Bruno n√£o suporta WS nativamente)
- Para usar: abra a collection no Bruno, selecione o environment **Local** e escolha o arquivo de √°udio no campo
